sense.gloss: Japanese league, ri, old Japanese unit of distance, approx. 3.927 km or 2.44 miles
neighbourhood (under the ritsuryō system; orig. of 50 homes)
unit of area (approx. 654 m by 654 m)
hometown, birthplace, native place, one's old home
returning home to one's parents (of a married person), visiting one's parents (for a prolonged period of stay)
bride's first visit to her parents after getting married
coming back (of an item; after having been on loan, etc. abroad)
temporarily returning to one's home (of a servant)
one's origins, one's upbringing, one's past
chogori, jeogori, short jacket traditionally worn by Koreans
settlement pattern of living in upland valleys and cultivating lower slopes
sweeping view of the eye, boundless expanse
one swift effort, rush through one's work, fast-talking, writing, etc.
totally at a loss, lose one's bearings, in a maze, in a fog, all at sea, up in the air, mystified, bewildered
lonely (place), remote, in the middle of nowhere

r_ele.r: ばんりのちょうじょう

sense.gloss: language of the common people, colloquial language, slang
language of the common people, colloquial language, slang
sociolect or secret language used by prostitutes in red-light districts during the Edo period
kagura performance held somewhere other than the imperial palace
hidden village (esp. hidden retreat for nobles or refuge for soldiers of a defeated army), isolated village
legendary land (deep in mountains or underground), Shangri-La
jōri system of land subdivision in ancient Japan

r_ele.r: あくじせんりをはしる

sdata.j: ↑千里↑↓せんり↓の↑道↑↓みち↓も↑一↑↓いっ↓↑歩↑↓ぽ↓から。
sdata.e: Rome wasn't built in a day.

sdata.j: ↑千里↑↓せんり↓の↑道↑↓みち↓も↑一↑↓いっ↓↑歩↑↓ぽ↓から。
sdata.e: Rome was not built in a day.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓ひと↓つ↑間違↑↓まちが↓えば↑一↑↓いち↓↑里↑↓り↓も↑狂↑↓くる↓う。
sdata.e: A miss is as good as a mile.

sdata.j: ↑悪事↑↓あくじ↓↑千里↑↓せんり↓を↑走↑↓はし↓るって↑言↑↓い↓うだろう。↑悪↑↓わる↓い↑噂↑↓うわさ↓はアッという↑間↑↓ま↓に↑広↑↓ひろ↓まっちゃうのさ。
sdata.e: Malicious gossip spreads like wildfire. I guess that's why they say bad news travels fast.

sdata.j: ↑悪事↑↓あくじ↓↑千里↑↓せんり↓を↑走↑↓はし↓るって↑言↑↓い↓うからね。
sdata.e: Well, they say bad news travels fast.

sdata.j: ↑悪事↑↓あくじ↓↑千里↑↓せんり↓を↑走↑↓はし↓る。
sdata.e: Ill news comes too soon.

sdata.j: これからどう↑会社↑↓かいしゃ↓を↑経営↑↓けいえい↓していったらいいのか、↑五里霧中↑↓ごりむちゅう↓だ。
sdata.e: We're all at sea about where to take our company from here.

sdata.j: この↑子犬↑↓こいぬ↓は↑里心↑↓さとごころ↓がついて↑泣↑↓な↓いているんだ。
sdata.e: This puppy is crying because it misses its mother.

sdata.j: お↑里↑↓さと↓が↑知↑↓し↓れる。
sdata.e: The shepherd, even when he become a gentleman, smells of the lamb.

sdata.j: １００↑里↑↓り↓を↑行↑↓い↓く↑者↑↓もの↓は９９↑里↑↓り↓を↑半↑↓なか↓ばとする。
sdata.e: There's many a slip between the cup and the lip.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑郷里↑↓きょうり↓の↑町↑↓まち↓は↑海↑↓うみ↓に↑接↑↓せっ↓している。
sdata.e: My home town is adjacent to the ocean.

sdata.j: ↑叔母↑↓おば↓は↑田舎↑↓いなか↓の↑人里↑↓ひとざと↓↑離↑↓はな↓れた↑家↑↓いえ↓に↑住↑↓す↓んでいる。
sdata.e: My aunt lives in a lonely house in the country.

sdata.j: ↑都合↑↓つごう↓の↑悪↑↓わる↓いこと、そうそう↑隠↑↓かく↓しとおせるもんじゃないよ。↑悪事↑↓あくじ↓↑千里↑↓せんり↓を↑行↑↓い↓く、っていうだろう。
sdata.e: You can't hide the fact that you're having a hard time. Bad news travels fast you know.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は「↑飛↑↓と↓び↑石↑↓いし↓」↑連休↑↓れんきゅう↓を↑利用↑↓りよう↓して↑郷里↑↓きょうり↓を↑訪↑↓おとず↓れた。
sdata.e: He availed himself of the 'off-and-on' holidays to visit his native country.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑郷里↑↓きょうり↓の↑両親↑↓りょうしん↓によく↑電話↑↓でんわ↓しますか。
sdata.e: Does he often call his parents at home?

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑人里↑↓ひとざと↓↑離↑↓はな↓れた↑家↑↓いえ↓に↑住↑↓す↓んでいた。
sdata.e: He lived in a house remote from the village.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑人里↑↓ひとざと↓↑離↑↓はな↓れた↑田舎↑↓いなか↓に↑住↑↓す↓んでいるので、↑町↑↓まち↓に↑来↑↓く↓ることはめったにない。
sdata.e: Living as he did in the remote countryside, he seldom came into town.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑人里↑↓ひとざと↓↑離↑↓はな↓れた↑農家↑↓のうか↓に↑住↑↓す↓んでいる。
sdata.e: He lives in a farmhouse remote from the world.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑人里↑↓ひとざと↓↑離↑↓はな↓れたところに↑住↑↓す↓んでいます。
sdata.e: She lives in rural seclusion.

sdata.j: ↑美土里↑↓みどり↓は↑時々↑↓ときどき↓↑子音↑↓しいん↓が↑落↑↓お↓ちる。
sdata.e: Midori sometimes drops consonants.

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑郷里↑↓きょうり↓の↑町↑↓まち↓は↑海↑↓うみ↓に↑接↑↓せっ↓している。
sdata.e: My hometown is adjacent to the ocean.

sdata.j: あー↑言↑↓い↓えば、こーゆー。↑里↑↓さと↓↑香↑↓かお↓ってばそんなヤツだ。↑文句↑↓もんく↓の↑言↑↓い↓い↑合↑↓あ↓いで↑勝↑↓か↓てるわけない。
sdata.e: You say po-tah-to I say po-tay-to. Rika is just that sort of girl. There's no way to win a battle of words with her.

sdata.j: ↑党首↑↓とうしゅ↓は↑今後↑↓こんご↓の↑方針↑↓ほうしん↓を↑一瀉千里↑↓いっしゃせんり↓に↑述↑↓の↓べ↑立↑↓だ↓てた。
sdata.e: The party leader rattled on at great length about future policies.

sdata.j: ↑里奈↑↓りな↓は↑家庭科↑↓かていか↓↑部↑↓ぶ↓に↑入↑↓はい↓っていて、↑主↑↓おも↓に↑洋裁↑↓ようさい↓をしている。
sdata.e: Rina is in the home economics club. Her main activity is dressmaking.

sdata.j: ↑悪事↑↓あくじ↓↑千里↑↓せんり↓を↑走↑↓はし↓る。
sdata.e: Bad news travels quickly.

sdata.j: ↑里↑↓さと↓さんは↑岩↑↓いわ↓の↑上↑↓うえ↓に↑立↑↓た↓っていました。
sdata.e: Mr Sato was standing on top of a boulder.

sdata.j: ↑里↑↓さと↓さんって↑文学↑↓ぶんがく↓が↑上手↑↓じょうず↓ですか。
sdata.e: Is Mr Sato good at literature?

sdata.j: かれはきっと↑里心↑↓さとごころ↓がついています。
sdata.e: He must be homesick.

sdata.j: ↑万里↑↓ばんり↓の↑長城↑↓ちょうじょう↓は↑五↑↓ご↓↑千↑↓せん↓↑五↑↓ご↓↑百↑↓ひゃく↓マイル↑以上↑↓いじょう↓の↑長↑↓なが↓さがあります。
sdata.e: The Great Wall of China is more than 5,500 miles long.

sdata.j: ↑千里↑↓せんり↓の↑道↑↓みち↓も↑一↑↓いっ↓↑歩↑↓ぽ↓から。
sdata.e: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
